column4: hello everybody, is there any news with nvidia geforce4 and 8.10? i would like to update, but im scared that the graphics acceleration wont work like stated in the release notes.
is there any point on wich i can see when the upgrade is safe?
bad thing. couldnt it be possible to downgrade the x server to the version used in 8.04?
i wish. my system is screwed up now and no downgrade possible
bad thing. dont the nv drivers work at least without 3d acc?
i got nvidia deivers working but lots of othee problems like no networking, many others have them too
how did you make the nvidia drivers working?
just reinstalled all nvidia stuff i guess
did you update or reinstall the system? i have another hdd lying arojund here and thinking about just trying it
so, on your system, the nvidia drivers work with 3d acc?
no idea. but i do have twinview working and nvidia logo shows up during x startup
could you type "glxgears"? if it looks good, 3d acc is fine
it probably works since compiz shows effects. im booting currently
ok thank you. ill put that other hdd in and have a try.
